Plot: Two ex-government agents turned rival industrial spies have to be at the top of their game when one of their companies prepares to launch a major product. However, they distract each other in more ways than one.
Title: Duplicity
Actors: Clive Owen, Julia Roberts, Tom Wilkinson, Paul Giamatti
tomatoConsensus: Duplicity is well-crafted, smart, and often funny, but it's mostly more cerebral than visceral and features far too many plot twists.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
